Kafene is a leading point-of-sale financing partner dedicated to empowering flexible ownership solutions for underserved customers nationwide. By enabling our retail partners to offer flexible lease-to-own (LTO) purchase options for prime and nonprime consumers, Kafene helps merchants grow their customer base, and meet growing demand for furniture, appliances, electronics, tires and other durable goods. Utilizing more than 20,000 data inputs in tandem with cutting-edge AI and machine learning technologies, our platform creates a best-in-class experience for both merchants and customers. With over $100 million in sales since inception, we are rapidly growing and expect to double our scale in the next 12 months.Our team values and celebrates our culture, and we are proudly selected as one of the Built-In Startups to Watch, Lendit Industry award finalist, and Forbes' Best Startup Employers.At Kafene, our Sales team is at the forefront of driving growth. Across the country, our passionate team of sales professionals represents Kafene to our merchants and customers and builds long-term relationships with new and existing merchants.We are seeking a Regional Vice President to help manage our growing sales team. This individual will report to the Head of Sales andthey will be responsible for coaching and leading an established team of successful Area Sales Managers, as well as recruiting new sales team members to fuel additional growth. The candidate should be a strong leader and a highly driven, goal-oriented manager who has experience guiding full-cycle sales teams (8-10 field sales representatives).Impact Hire, develop and lead a team of Area Sales Managers that drive new merchant acquisition and build existing merchant relationships.
Monitor individual KPIs and expenditures of their team members to promote the most productive sales activities.
Lead regularly scheduled 1-on-1’s, coaching and feedback sessions, and performance reviews.
Evaluate the competitive landscape, identify strategic partnership opportunities in the assigned region, and develop and execute sales deployment plans.
Manage, update, and maintain the sales pipeline through our CRM.
As a member of the sales leadership team, provide ongoing feedback to the broader Revenue team on activities, production, and goals using internal analytical and reporting tools.
Coordinate and track all marketing activities and promotional programs within the coverage region.
Participate in the sales leadership team’s planning and development of business plans, strategies, goals, and budgets. Qualifications 5+ years of outside sales leadership experience in a high-growth B2B role.
Experience in consumer product / financial services / lending / fintech industries preferred.
Bachelor’s degree preferred or commensurate outside sales experience.
Excellent communication skills.
Able to travel up to 50-70% throughout the sales region. Kafene is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other legally protected characteristics. If you are applying for a job in the U.S. and need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please send an e-mail to jobs@kafene.com and let us know the nature of your request and contact information. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this email address.
